question: Which Indian sportsperson has clinched India's first Gold in the 18th Jakarta Asian Games 2018?
explanation: On August 19, Wrestler Bajrang Punia clinched India\'s first gold medal in the 18th Asian Games after defeating Takatani Daichi of Japan in the men\'s 65 kg freestyle title bout in Jakarta, Indonesia. Punia, who hails from Haryana, had won three consecutive gold medals -- 2018 CWG (Gold Coast), Tbilisi Grand Prix (Georgia) and Yasar Dogu International (Istanbul) -- ahead of the 2018 Asian Games.  Earlier, Indian shooters Apurvi Chandela and Ravi Kumar won the bronze medal in the 10m Air Rifle Mixed Team event at the 2018 Asian Games. It was India\'s first medal in the ongoing event.
